effect_entries.effect:
Held: Increases the power of the holder's Dark moves by 20%.
Held by a Multitype Pokémon: Holder's type becomes Dark.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Dark-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage. Changes Arceus's and Judgment's type to Dark.

flavor_text_entries.text:
あくの　タイプの　石盤。
持たせると　あくタイプの
技の　威力が　強まる。

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It’s a stone tablet that boosts the
power of Dark-type moves.

Strumento da dare a un Pokémon.
Lastra di pietra che potenzia le mosse
di tipo Buio.

Engancha y araña al objetivo con unas potentes
y enormes garras afiladas.

Ein Item zum Tragen. Diese Steintafel verstärkt
Attacken vom Typ Unlicht.

Objet à tenir. Une tablette en pierre augmentant
la puissance des capacités de type Ténèbres.

악타입의 석판.
지니게 하면 악타입
기술의 위력이 강해진다.

あくの　タイプの　せきばん。
もたせると　あくタイプの
わざの　いりょくが　つよまる。

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It is a stone tablet that boosts the
power of Dark-type moves.
